attributes.action: Not ban xl bullies, let good owners keep there dogs
attributes.additional_details: To not just ban the dog because that's just an easy answer, there needs to be a way good dogs and owners can keep there family dog and not loose it because of idiots
attributes.background: License xl bullies, if you start killing the good dogs your no better than the bad owners, I have a xl and he's amazing with kids

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
